describe: Job Description● Create long-term and short-term marketing strategies aligned with business goals andmarket.● Develop, implement, and refine comprehensive, multi-channel campaign strategies(email, socials, ads...) for demand generation and monitor their execution.● Identify and evaluate new marketing technologies to enhance team performance andimprove ROI.● Establish KPIs for marketing campaigns and evaluate effectiveness based on these KPIs.● Plan and implement marketing campaigns across both digital and traditional channels toenhance brand awareness and attract potential clients.● Identify, establish, and maintain relationships with strategic partners and potential clients.● Create high-quality content and communication strategies to build strong client andpartner relationships.● Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of marketingtechnologies.● Analyze market trends and competitors to develop new marketing strategies.● Measuring and reporting marketing strategies effectiveness, collecting data andevaluating effectiveness compared with goals.● Use data from tools like Google Analytics for data-driven decision-making.● Coordinate and oversee marketing team operations to ensure timely and efficientexecution of tasks.● Stay up-to-date with the latest marketing technology trends and best practices, and applythem to improve team efficiency and effectiveness.● Create reports and make improvement suggestions based on analytical results.
require: ● Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.● At least 5 - 7 years of experience in field marketing, ideally in the technologyindustry.● At least 2-3 years of experience in a leadership position within marketing.● Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, as the position requiresinteraction with international clients.● Expertise in SEO, SEM, Social Media, Email Marketing, and various digital marketingchannels, particularly for global markets.● Experience using Google Analytics and advertising management platforms such asGoogle Ads and Facebook Ads.● Capacity to anticipate trends and suggest strategies that align with the company's visionand growth objectives.● Skills in planning, budget management, and effective execution of marketing initiatives.● Ability to analyze data and market trends to make informed decisions.● Ability to assess the effectiveness of campaigns and adjust plans accordingly.● Basic design software skills (such as Canva, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) are aplus.● Good communication skills both internally and externally.
interest: What we offer● 13th month & Performance bonus.● All employees are involved in social insurance, medical insurance, unemploymentinsurance, periodic health examinations, etc.● Provide laptop and monitor.● Work From Home policy: 24 days per year (2 days per month).● 12 days of Annual Leave (Employees who have worked at Kimei Global for 1 year willhave an additional 2 days of summer leave).● Holidays are based on the annual announcement of the Government.● Company trip, annual health check, year-end party: Once per year.● Activity outdoors, happy hour in/out office, Birthday gift.● Free parking fee.● Various snacks and drinks in our bar.● Gifts for Children's Day, Women's Day, and Men's DayWorking time: Monday till Friday (8 AM - 5 PM)
